What are the symptoms of Borjeson-Forssman-Lehmann syndrome ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Borjeson-Forssman-Lehmann syndrome? The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for Borjeson-Forssman-Lehmann syndrome.
